featured.title: LLM from Scratch
featured.description: Built a Large Language Model from scratch to produce quantifiable proof of work showcasing end-to-end ML capabilities
featured.detailedDescription: Implemented a complete LLM pipeline including tokenization, model architecture, training loop, and deployment. This project demonstrates deep understanding of transformer architectures and production ML systems.

featured.title: RAG for LLM
featured.description: Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline to improve LLM performance for specified tasks
featured.detailedDescription: Built a complete RAG system using Langchain and ChromaDB for vector storage. Implemented efficient retrieval mechanisms and context injection to enhance LLM responses based on user needs and search queries.

featured.title: ML Trading System
featured.description: Production-ready machine learning system for financial trading with real-time predictions
featured.detailedDescription: Designed and deployed a complete ML trading system with data pipelines, model training, backtesting framework, and real-time inference API. Includes risk management and portfolio optimization.

all.title: Sentiment Analysis API
all.description: REST API for real-time sentiment analysis using fine-tuned BERT models
all.detailedDescription: Built a production-grade sentiment analysis API with custom fine-tuned BERT models. Includes preprocessing pipelines, model serving with FastAPI, and Docker deployment. Handles multiple languages and domains.

all.title: Custom Image Classifier
all.description: Transfer learning based image classification system for custom datasets
all.detailedDescription: Implemented transfer learning using ResNet and EfficientNet for custom image classification tasks. Includes data augmentation, training pipeline, and model optimization techniques.
